attributes.action: Say no the new TUPE rules
attributes.additional_details:
I whole heartedly believe that the new TUPE Rules signed in January are wrong and will lead to unfair treatment of staff in the workplace and poorer government services.

People will be transferred from their current jobs into new companies and will have their pay and terms downgraded more easily in order to create more profits for the rich and worse living conditions for the working people of this country.

We need to try and protect what few rights we have left as employees as this will affect every working person in this country and will further increase the zero hour contract policy we see now.
